commentary: Jade includes a nice note too, to help get the taste of Jake out of our mouths. Very considerate of her. She has no idea John will be reading this over her dead body. This is some choice sadstuck here, guys. Perhaps the first true helping of sadstuck ever? A nice appetizer before Hivebent, which is an arc that does more than anything before it to bust open the floodgates on the tragic teenfeels phase of Homestuck's history. It never quite looks back after that.
